dating.post: Does this mean that the reweaving patch job has been totally debunked? If so, does this mean that the 1988 carbon dating was correct after all?

resources.author: luis
resources.post: “Finding Jesus: Faith, Fact, Forgery, which explores the many mysteries of the Bible while scientifically proving what we already know spiritually: that Jesus lived, was crucified, arose and ascended back to heaven.”I am very skeptical about this comment. CNN doesn’t stike me as a pro Jesus organization. If anything, they would set out to disprove it.
resources.title: Set Your DVR:  An Unprecedented CNN Event on March 1
